Chicken dimsums : These were also good.

The experience was fabulous the staff is polite and courteous, it’s a great place to chill with friends and family.

I totally loved the burger a must try. 2)Mac N cheese - Classic Favourite it was well done with lots of Cheese. 3) Confit Chicken Ravioli - Poached Chicken prepared in Dutch sauce...read more

review: My favourite Pan Asian Restaurant in town has one more junction to satisfy all my Asian food cravings. It’s been a fabulous 5 years of YYC and this place has never disappointed. Right from the perfect sushi to Dimsum it’s always yum. On my recent visit I tried 1) Chicken chilli oil Dimsum ( top favourite), 2) Butter pepper garlic prawn Dimsum ( it’s from the new menu) you must try this if you love prawns. 🍤 3) Crispy cream sushi - cream cheese, carrot, crispy chive and cucumber. 4) Rock n roll sushi - rock shrimp, tempura spicy mayo. 4) Kung pao chicken with the butter pepper garlic sizzling noodles. 5) Peppermint Mochi ice cream and Rocky Road mochi 6) Chocolate mud...read more
name: Yum Yum Cha

review:
The market place is a place to satisfy all your food cravings. It’s a huge restaurant with a capacity of 200 people and serves finest buffet around that area. The have 9 kitchens and serve 11 different cuisines and have a huge variety of dishes.

A huge section of chaat, pasta, Indian, Asian, steaks, pizza, burgers, Italian, shawarmas and a huge selection of desserts. The buffet starts from ₹649.

They also have a huge selection of Freak Shake I tried the naughty nutty shake which was decent in taste.

All in all the experience was fabulous and you must try the place as they have a huge variety of dishes.
name: The Marketplace

review: The clock tower is a very beautiful and attractive property as the name suggests it is similar to a clock tower. It has a beautiful ambiance with an amazing terrace area. The service was fast and the staff was courteous. For food and drinks you must try- 1) cheesy fries which were crisp and tasted absolutely delicious with red wine sangria, a great combination. 2) Dahi kebab were too good to be missed, it should be definitely given a try by all vegetarians. 3) Porkpino Pizza - Bacon, Pork Sausages, Jalapeños & Spicy Red Chilli 4) Smoked bolognese Spaghetti- slow cooked lamb sauce serve with crispy garlic bread. 5) chocolate mud slice was the perfect dessert to end the meal...read more
name: Clock Tower

review:
Master of Malts is located in the heart of the capital, Connaught Place. The place is huge and perfect to spend time with your squad. The things which I loved the most here were the *Chicken Lasagna* it was thick and creamy, the stacks of lasagna stuffed with chicken and topped with cheese sauce is something u can’t miss with the crispy garlic bread. I also loved the Chicken Burger Huge Chicken patty which juicy and well cooked with crispy fries. We also ordered the green Thai curry, mezze platter,veggie pizza, shakes.

All in all we had a good time do check out this place !!
name: Master Of Malts

review: Fat cat bistro is another Delivery chain serving in south Delhi. The place is different from other places firstly because of *Wide Variety of dishes from middle Eastern to Brazilian, Spanish and Indian as well* secondly the *packaging* is super duper Cute loved the section for the wooden cutlery. Coming to the dishes what I ordered and absolutely loved !! * DIY Roasted Garden Vegetables Tacos : Fresh avocado, sour cream, cheddar cheese, lettuce, guacamole in a soft taco, ( everything is delivered in a package and it can be assembled together) absolutely loved the flavour of sautéed veggies with sour cream dips highly recommend this. * Pasteis : Deep fried Patties with lots of cheese...read more
name: Fat Cat Bistro

review:
The place is superb to visit with friends. The service is quick and the rooftop is amazing!!
For food Will highly recommend the Butter chicken momos ( Momos prepared in Makhani spicy butter chicken gravy) amazing fusion must try !! For non vegetarian lovers must try Drums of heaven, Mutton seekh , Butter chicken with butter Naan the best combinations. For drinks must try the Fruit punch drink and also the Alfredo Sauce Pasta.
All in all you can try out this place with ur friends.
name: Judge & Jury

review:
This place is perfect to party with your friends, along with some great food and drinks which can’t be missed. The service is quick and staff is courteous.
Coming to food must try the Chipotle cheese garlic bread, Cheese Pav bhaji, quesadillas, Veggie Gang pizza ( three pepper, cherry tomatoes, mushroom, onions, broccoli, baby corn, zucchini, peri peri fries.
Must try the chuckles green apple delight,lemon ice tea and the Oreos thick shake.
For the desert highly recommend the chocolate dome ( brownie pieces, vanilla ice cream, chocolate dome, and warm melted chocolate sauce)
name: Electro by Dum Maro Dum

review:
The place has an outdoor as well as an indoor sitting. The open terrace area is perfect to chill with friends.
Now coming to food must try the thick Chocolate Shake, berry cookie shake. Cheesy nachos, crispy spring rolls, dragon wheelz pizza, mix Sauce pasta.

Best part of the meal was the dessert death my chocolate, Huge slice of cake along with ice cream and topped with chocolate sauce.

The place is reasonably priced and a great place to chill with friends.
name: Epic Kitchen N Bar

review:
Band Baaja Baaraat, is perfect place to enjoy the Indian wedding food without actually attending a wedding. The concept of buffet is fabulous, where you can enjoy the lip smacking food at very affordable price.
Must try the mutton seekh, corn chaat, chicken tikka, chicken lollipop for starters. For the mains you have a huge variety to choose from which includes butter chicken, Dal Makhani,Biryani, panner , mutton rogan josh along with crispy Naans.

For the desserts must have the bite size gulab jamun. The restaurant is perfect place to have huge variety of dishes.
name: Band Baaja Baaraat

review:
Bokan is a perfect place to chill with your friends over some great food and drinks. First of all the fabulous terrace area is designed beautifully with, amazing indoor seating as well.

Coming to the food the top recommendation would be creamy Alfredo (White ) sauce pasta, which tasted perfect with the crispy garlic bread. Tandoori chaap for the vegetarians is a must try. Highly recommend the soft tender Malai chicken tikka was which you can’t miss at all !!

For mains must try the veggie loaded Pizza, Chicken Manchurian with Hakka noodles & Chicken biryani with raita.

All in all the place is a must visit, for a great time !!
name: Bokan

review:
A cozy little cafe located in Nfc market is something which you can’t miss! The cafe has a beautiful indoor and well as outdoor airing along with a very beautiful fine terrace area which give a beautiful view of the whole market.

Coming to the food it influenced by Mumbai dishes. We tried the Chicken Chalupa, Gyro Chicken wrapped in chalupa with fries and dip, the huge Non Vegetarian mezze platter, for mains I tried half n pizza bbq Chicken, chicken tikka along with Chicken Florentine which was the best and highly recommend it. We ended with Hot chocolate fudge with extra nuts which can never go wrong. Also must try shakes.
name: DeliBombay Cafe & Delicatessen

review: Kiyan at The Roseate is one of the luxurious property in Delhi. The huge property is a delight for every visitor and the warm hospitality by Chef Simran Singh Thapar and Staff is something which will make your experience even more warm. The property which spread over a huge area is an amalgamation of contemporary and inherent charm. I tried the food from the on going Pizza Festival which is basically Around the World In 8 Pizza. I tried the half and half Mushroom Teriyaki ( Japan) Teriyaki king oyster mushroom, tempura enokitake , leeks and the Kadhai Paneer Pizza ( India) Tandoori Panner Tikka, bell pepper, and red onions. I was in love with the Chicken Tikka Masala Calzone (uk) it was...read more
name: Kiyan - The Roseate

review:
Kalamata is perfect place to grab some drinks and snacks with friends on a lazy weekend. The beautiful terrace will make you super happy.

You must try the Keema Paratha, Dahi ke Kebab, Veg buns, Galouti Kebab, Papad Panner, Hummus and Pita.

The place also has special discounts and happy hours so do check the place out, it will definitely be an amazing experience.
name: Kalamata Cookhouse & Bar

review:
Tikka junction courtyard located right from of Aurbindo college du is something you can’t miss. Right from the open and well decorated ambiance and ample of sitting it’s perfect place to chill with friends in both day and nights, the fairy light definitely makes the place more quirky and amazing.

Now coming to food and drinks must try the thick creamy chocolaty shakes, chilled coolers. I would highly the chicken sharbiydan with masala kulcha, Tandoori spring rolls, Tandoori Momos, chicken lollipops. For the main must try the butter chicken & kadai chicken.

All in all the place is amazing will totally love the vibe and the food is also yum !!
name: Tikka Junction Courtyard

review: I recently tried out some lip smacking burgers and sandwiches from this place. Firstly the packaging was done quite well and delivery was also on time. I tried the Chicken Rachel burger + blueberry shake + fries, the huge juicy burger with chicken patty along with fries and shakes tasted amazing. Will highly recommend the pan fried mushroom sandwich and the spinach & mushroom affair burger for the vegetarian, the crispy fried veggies inside were just delicious, and will be loved, do give it a try. The white sauce pasta was creamy and served with garlic bread also good enough. The best part of the place is that it’s not very expensive and plus the burger and sandwiches size are huge...read more
name: Woodchuck

review:
Bunta bar is perfect place to chill with friends. The amazing ambience, and lipsmakcing food and drinks go well.

Must try the Vegetarian and non vegetarian platter which consists of assorted kebabs, must try the keema pav, drums of heaven and the curly fries.

Will highly recommend this place.
name: Bunta Bar Live

review: The brew room serves some freshly brewed coffee along with some lip smacking food. We tried the salted caramel mocha coffee three layered coffee which is highly recommend. The flavour of caramel at the bottom gives it the perfect taste, each coffee I served with a biscotti. We also tried the Swiss chocolate smoothie For the food I would highly recommend the Penne, orange zest, spinach, sun dried tomato Alfredo pasta honestly I haven’t had a better pasta than this. The pasta was delicious the orange zest added so much flavour to the pasta along with sundries tomorrow’s that you can’t miss it at all. We also tried the puff pizza butter mushroom,olives. The puff pizza was crispy on...read more
name: The Brew Room

review: Edesia is a fine dining Multi - cuisine restaurant which serves some really delicious food. Edesia specialises in a lavish Buffet spread. To start with some delicious veg and non veg kebabs would highly recommend Chicken Malai Tikka & Beetroot Tikka, for the mains one has a huge variety of Chinese - Indian mains to choose from Hakka Noodles, Sweet n Sour, Polenta, Chicken Curry, Dal Makhani, Kadai Panner and happily enjoyed my indian curries with crispy naans - parathas and not to miss the wide range of pickles counter. As they always say no meal is complete without Desserts *_*. The huge section of Desserts is just irresistible, I totally loved the Nougat Cake, Chocolate Cake slice...read more
name: Edesia - Crowne Plaza

review: A very nice place to chill with friends. The food and drinks variety is huge and also the decent pricing. I would totally recommend grilled chicken so well done with crispy garlic bread and potato mash also give a try to thick KitKat shakes, BBQ panner Bruschetta, Alfredo pasta, nachos, also 3 cheese pasta was yum, must try chilli cheese toast. I would recommend you to try this place out with friends, super pretty ambiance, polite staff and really good service.
name: Cafe Wink

review:
A good place to satisfy you some irresistible Indian food cravings. The dishes I would highly recommend Tandoori Chicken, the quantity was super fulfilling and the taste was delicious also. Next was seekh kebabs would highly recommend this one you can’t just miss this. Panner tikka a vegetarian delight also tastes quite yum tender juicy big huge chunks of cottage cheese were well done. Not to miss the chicken biryani, butter chicken and dal makhani classic combination can never ever go wrong.

In all good experience.
name: Zabardast Zaffran

review: Social Nehru Place, is one of my favourite places to go be it a hectic weekday or some fun weekends social is the place to be. The menu for food and drinks are wide. My favourites include breakfast trays, some lip smacking Dimsums, the dilli 6 Chaat Platter is just you can’t miss. The kebab platter which has some assorted kebabs paired well with drinks for a night out with friends. The huge selection of Liiit, cocktails , shakes, ice teas, along with some finger food like cheesy fries, spicy wings,the Chinese boxes, Biryani are also you can’t miss. For desserts you must try Ramesh Suresh, Chocolate chutzpah, layer cake. Social is one of my favourites places in Delhi for...read more
name: Nehru Place Social

review:
The place is serving some lip smacking food since many years now, the view from 16th floor is spectacular. The place has a really good vibe, a perfect place to grab a fine dine meal.

Would highly recommend the dumplings chicken & chive, chicken wontons, spring rolls, spinach n cheese dumpling . For mains must try king pap chicken with noodles. Caramel custard, chocolate mud cake perfect to end the meal.
name: Royal China

review:
Ni Hao, Asian Speciality Restaurant In Radisson Noida. The place has very beautiful fine dine ambiance, courteous staff & the menu is brilliantly curated with authentic flavour.
Best part is the live kitchen, where chefs prepare some flavourful dishes.
I tried some of the chefs special Dimsum basket totally loved chicken Sui Mai, smoked chicken, mushroom & Bol Choy, for starters prawns in coriander & basil sauce.
For mains would recommend tofu clay pot, Kung pao chicken, fish in oyster sauce along with noodles.

In desserts HIGHLY RECOMMEND, FRIED ICE CREAM one of the best I have had in town. You can’t miss this.

Totally worth it highly recommend for great food.
name: Ni Hao - Radisson Noida

review:
This place serves some lip-smacking Indian food at very affordable prices. I would love to mention about the delivery and packaging of the food which was great and order delivered at right time. Would recommend to try the Biryani, Shahi Tukda , Dahi Kebab, Bharwa aloo, kada panner, pakka panner, Dal Makhani.

Must try this place
name: Handiwala

review: Biryani By Kilo one of the most famous chain for some lip smacking biryani in Delhi & Ncr. I have always been fan of this place, for a huge variety available and authentic flavours. Loved the Mutton Ghost Lucknowi Biryani, perfect taste it was mild spicy tastes perfect with raita. I’m also a fan of the soft Mutton Galouti what they served well Minch meat with mint chutney is just perfect and would love to mention one of the softest and delicious galouti I have had. I also tried panner nawabi with ulte tawa ka paratha was just amazing. Chunks of cottage cheese in creamy tomato gravy ( tried it first time love it). I ended the meal with some Phirni ita just Delicious, never skip while...read more
name: Biryani By Kilo

review:
A good reasonable place in Noida to satisfy your all sorts of cravings. The place is small and cozy but serves some delicious food, with huge variety to choose from. Totally would recommend Chicken Makhani Bruschetta, Baked Cheesy Fries, Alfredo Penne pasta was bang on and loved it. I would highly recommend the wheat Chicken Momos they were so soft and delicious.

A perfect meal was ended with some warm Chocolate and Oreo Mud Cake. Would recommend this place in Noida for quick and tasty snacking options.
name: Bistro 37

review:
Totally love this place for its unique concept. The newly revamped Echoes in Satya Niketan is something you can’t miss. The ambiance and feel of the place is young & Peppy . The prices are pocket friendly. Would recommend the thick shakes, afghani creamy fish, chicken lollipop, and tandoori momos are amazing !

Must try the place with your college buddies
name: Echoes Satyaniketan

review: La Piazza is one of the finest italian restaurant in town and it is famous for its some special in-house recipes & imported Italian products. The Restaurant is famous for its delectable wood-fired pizza , homemade pasta, risottos, desserts which will bring you back to the place again and again... The restaurants is serving since last 24 years is one of my favourites in town for Italian cuis The old school ambiance paired with some fine drinks is a perfect spot for all the food lovers.The hospitality at Hyatt has been great always and its a delight to dine in .. The experience is just amazing ! Coming to the food.... minestrone soup and handmade focaccia bread with bell pepper dip...read more
name: La Piazza - Hyatt Regency

review:
A pan asian restaurant in town can't be missed. I totally loved the packaging and taste of the food was proper and intact. The delivery was right on time.

The things I tried and recommend are :
1) Thai spring roll ( highly recommend these crispy rolls with an waning filling served with Thai chilli sauce)
2)emperors delights
3)veg Hakka noodles
4) black bean vegetables

It is a place which can't be missed, if you are pan asian food lover.
name: Asia Central

review:
For God’s Cake is one of the best bakeries in North Campus and loved by all college students. The pricing is quite affordable and the variety is huge. The best selling are the beautiful Freak Shakes I ordered for the Unicorn Freak Shake it was not only Gorgeous but tasted also absolutely delicious... I also tried Nutella Mousse Cake, Honey Almond Pastry, Red Velvet Cupcake , Nutella Cupcake...

They have huge range of Cake In Jar and my absolute favourite was Nutella brownie as it can never ever go wrong... Also you will find crispy potato twister steamed up well with refreshing ice tea...

This is the best place to get all your sweet cravings sorted at a very reasonable price.
name: For God's Cake

review: A Box of Pizza 🍕 & Netflix is what I need to make my boring night turn to an awesome & tasty 😋 night . I tried out POMP: Pizza on my Plate a late night delivery outlet perfect to satisfy your desire for a great meal. The packaging was unusual, the boxes could be easily converted to plates, or convenient storage boxes. The delivery was right on time. Now coming to food, they have a huge range of food and drinks to choose from.. I ordered the Nerds on Mushroom Pizza ( wild mushroom cream, shiitake,button mushroom & Ricotta ) & FarmVille ( Mushrooms, Corn, onions, bell pepper, mozzarella) both the pizza were spectacular. Perfectly baked thin crust pizza with fresh juicy...read more
name: POMP - Pizza On My Plate

review: Artusi Ristorante the Italian fine dining restaurant is located in Gk2 M block Market. The restaurant has a courteous staff who make sure that we have a complete fine dine experience, with some authentic Italian dishes & it’s authenticity is to a specific region called Emilia-Romagna with its capital Bologna. The menu is massive, and customisation can be made according to preference. We started with the Tomino ( cheese melted over a toasted bread sautéed mushrooms with a glaze of truffle oil) this was a signature dish and was impressive and should not be missed by vegetarians. We also tried the Ferro salad ( lettuce salad with grapes, raisins, pears , goat cheese , topped with wine...read more
name: Artusi Ristorante e Bar

review: If Zomato allowed more stars for this place then it would have definitely deserved more but yes a full score too yum yum Cha without a doubt its my monthly pilgrimage quiet literally :p visit almost each month and have tried everything on the menu. I would like the mention about few of my favourites what not to miss waise tu everything is awesome just a little favourite. KFC bao. Amongst the dim sum Prawn curry dumpling, prawn Hargao, chicken chilli oil, Bok Choy, chilli cheese, Cantonese veg. In sushi must try ebi tempura, asparagus tempura, crispy cream. Must try the sliced garlic chicke, wonton, spring rolls, corn cakes, aromatic prawns. You can miss green Thai curry with rice...read more
name: Yum Yum Cha

review:
The new be in town you me is something you can’t miss if you are seeker for some good pan Asian food.

The place serves a huge variety of scrumptious sushi, dim sum, ramen, noodles, shakes starters, desserts which are just perfect to satisfy your taste buds.

I would recommend you the garden dragon sushi, totally loved the crunch in it and worth a try, New York cheese and chilli oil are also perfect and can’t be missed. Don’t miss out the freak shakes loved the caramel.

All in all one should try out this place.
name: You Mee

review:
Recently ordered food from this place and was highly impressed with the food. The packaging was perfect, and delivered on time.
I just loved everything I ordered the chilli chicken was just bang on, as I mentioned not to make it spicy it was perfect. The shahi planner in creamy gravy was delicious with crispy parathas just loved it. From the Chinese selection we tried the Veg spring roll they were crispy and tasty and loved the sweet n sour veggies with noodles

This place is a must try to get your hunger pangs sorted with yummy food
name: Shekaza - Since 1992

review:
SWAD- DESH VIDESH KA,  is a cafe with beautiful ambience .The cafe is located in nehru place, opp. EROS hotel. They have desi food and that too with a videshi (international )flavours.

Must try

 Maggie Manchow Soup – must try this yummy Maggie soup with a man how flavour.Thai crunch Salad - crispy crunchy raw papaya salad with a yummy dressings and topped with peanuts for the crunch. Manglorian fried idli were well done with yummy coconut chutney.
Chat lovers must try the Chit chat Dahi Bhalla and Raj kachori

For mains we ordered Green Thai curry, Dal makhni, Paneer Makhani with breads.
Must try Gulaab phirni, jalebi with Rabri
name: SWAD - Desh Videsh Ka

review: The chain of restaurants Punjab Grill is a very famous name when it comes to north Indian food, with the newest branch in the posh lanes of khan market. A very fine dine place with very perfect interiors and perfect meal. The place is based on a theme of 'we travelled' and they have put a telephone in one corner of it where you can dial and hear some interesting stories. Their menu here, is vast which have some lip smacking modern twist to the well know classics.   NOW COMING TO THE FOOD; We started with the non veg platter and the seekh keabs were just delicious soft and had great flavours, and in the veg we tried the platter of veg kebabs loved the, Dahi kebabs & Malai Broccoli. I...read more
name: Punjab Grill

review: I tried this very famous bakery of Delhi. I ordered couple of things : 1)TRIPLE CHOCOLATE MOUSSE  2)RASPBERRY CHOCOLATE DOME 3) MACAROONS  4) RASPBERRY & PISTACHIOS 5)  SALTED CARAMEL CHOCOLATE TART  The delivery was right on time and packaging was done quite well. In the eggless options loved the raspberry dome with a soft moist filing of chocolate. The raspberry glaze was...read more
name: Sugarama Patisserie

review: Pan Asian food is one my favorite and love trying out new places all around my place for delivery when I’m lazy to go out for a meal. Orient Heritage is a place I recently tried. The food was delivered on time and was well packed. We had the : 1. CURRY DIMSUMS , Soft steamed chicken dimsum with the peanut based in house sauce was so delicious and yummy that I recommend this to try out for sure. 2. BASIL CHICKEN DIMSUM , The little cuties looked so beautiful and tasted also absolutely perfect & tasty. 3. RED THAI CURRY WITH STEAMED RICE , Thai curry was creamy with a tangy flavor tasted perfectly with steam rice. The flavor was perfect. 4. CRISPY CHICKEN SWEET N SOUR, Classic old...read more
name: Orient Heritage

review: Went for lunch with friends on a lazy afternoon. The decor is bright and has a very huge comfortable seating area with a beautiful bar right in the Centre. We started with the Sushi boat which had a huge and fulfilling selection of sushi starting from the carbon sushi , tuna , yellowtail, salmon O-nigiri. We also had some soft chicken buns, chili chicken shawarma, rock shrimp tempura and Butayaki !! For the mains, we ordered the 1. wok braised sliced chicken 2. sichuan style crispy prawns 3. Lamb rendang curry with fried rice  4. stir fried noodles   5. Udon noodles. For the desserts we had Liquid hazelnut fondant cake matcha and blueberry quenelle, mochi icecream 4 different...read more
name: Pa Pa Ya

review: This place is just perfect for all the guilt free indulgence and it won’t disappoint in aspects of good taste, price and presentation. I happen to have visit this place and I have had an amazing experience, I would highly recommend the berry smoothie bowl, Italian style egg with toast, grilled chicken burger, cold coffee, grilled fish in lemon caper sauce. This is a perfect place for all those who want to eat good but stay healthy & fit !!
name: Getafix

review: Located in the Lodhi market this place is a small little place serving some flavourful and lip smacking food. This place has beautiful ambiance and interiors with shades of purple ( basically jamun colour) . The place serves some regional food and must try chicken 65, Arbi, panner tikka, mutton ghee toast, butter chicken, keema Naan,Chicken xucatti, mutton rogan josh with some paratha or Naan. To end with you have to try jamun kulfi, soft spongy rasmalai & gulab jamun
name: Jamun

review: Mia Bella located In HKV is one of the most romantic places I have visited recently. The place has a very beautiful ambiance which can’t be expressed in words, totally breathtaking. This place served some really good food I really liked bell pepper in meat sauce, Bruschetta bar, Wild mushroom risotto was really tasty a must try. One should must try the Tiramisu one of the best tiramisu I have had recently
name: Mia Bella - Romantic Kitchen & Bar

review: The cake company is a complete satisfaction to all your sweet cravings!! I have tried the chocolate mousse tub oh my that’s a whole tub of goodness and yummyiness, a tub of Chocolate mousse, is what you need and I’m sure one won’t satisfy your craving hence u would need more because it’s just yummy with chunks of hazelnut and almonds totally yum. I tried the eggless pineapple pastry the classic pastry can never ever go wrong it was soft moist spongy and totally yum. Also you must try the handcrafted chocolates or bars and not to forget the 10 layer cake, A must try place
name: The Cake Company

review:
I finally tried WOODBOX CAFE its a outlet located in hudson lane, north campus. The dishes I  tried 

1) Herbivorous plate- the huge plate comes with a variety of dimsums, peri peri fries,chilli potatoes,garlic breads,dragon rolls,burger with 2 dips.The presentation 
was really good.

2) Freak waffles- the giant multiple layered waffle was really great & a must try 

3) Cheesy Nachos : Baked nachos are a must try at Woodbox cafe, its cheesy and best part being they don't get soggy 

overall it was a good place and a must try !.
name: Wood Box Cafe

review: The Irish house is a fantastic place known for its cocktails & offcourse some great food. Im totally in love with this place
name: The Irish House

review:
One of my favorite places for some good indian food ! The ambiance & interior of the place is just like a road side dhabas on highways!
The place apart from having great interiors serves great food too ! Butter chicken, Malai tikka, galouti kebabs, nalli nihari, maaki roti & sarso ka saag, rasmalai, Gulaab Jasmun, Dhabe ka Neerja , kaala khatta Banta are my fav picks at this place. Must try this place.
name: Dhaba - Estd 1986 Delhi

review:
The place is perfect for a romantic date or casual chill with friends. The terrace which is the most attractive thing about the place and it’s so beautiful that I just can’t take off my eyes from the beautiful ambiance.

Coming to food drinks
1) Nachos very well prepared crispy with a proportioned dips added on to it
2) BBQ Fries Crispy Fries topped with cheesy sauce & BBQ sauce
3) Pizza is a must try here it is super delicious and super cheesy, and one of the best thin crust pizza I have had
4) Veg Mezze Platter was decent and can be paired well with some drinks.

All in all place is super for some great fun
name: The Sky High

review:
SANADIGE is one best example of a great Fine Dine experience in New Delhi. The place is located in heart of Delhi Chankyapuri. The whole ambiance, the look and feel of the whole place is just breathtaking. One will definitely go into a great experience of food & drinks.

Must must have is the Prawns in garlic pepper garlic sauce, Chicken stew, anjal tawa Dry,mutton masala Dry, malabar fish curry, with some Malabar paratha, appam and you can end with some payasam.

Totally a worth try for sea food lovers lovers
name: Sana-Di-Ge

review: CP is the place where you will find a lot of places to explore from. Recently only I visited Darzi Bar & Kitchen the whole concept is based on the Darzi ( tailoring and stitching ) the interiors of the place speaks for it very beautifully. I loved the whole ambiance and feel of the place with some huge scissors, threads, sewing machine etc was something which will catch your eye. Now for the food I started with some starters like the very famous Isbt Makhani Maggi, this was a unique Maggi no doubt prepared well in a makhani gravy with some cream on top, I also tried Rum Chicken which was Chicken legs marinated well in some spicy tangy sauce glazed with some rum. I also try the...read more
name: The Darzi Bar & Kitchen

review: This place is a must try if you haven’t !! To be honest I have beard a lot about this place and yes it was amazing I loved the shawarma one of the best I had indeed. The chicken burger was also great & the chicken lollipop is also a tasty. Do try this place !!
name: The Tummy Section

review:
The newly opened Nueva is a perfect definition of FINE DINE or DINE IN STYLE. The place has fantastic interiors which are just breath taking, divided in two floors ( dining & bar).

For the food must try Chicken Piri Piri, Cottage Cheese salad ( the cheese is a form a jelly is just cherry on the cake) presentation is fabulous. Chicken Empanadas are just yummy and can’t be missed. Veg Tempura Sushi is awesome.
For mains do try Butter Poached Sole With chili infused sauce & Chicken Breast with Vindaloo sauce. Meal can be ended with some yummy coffee and Parched.
name: Nueva

review:

review:
Craving for some eggless waffles ! Drool is the place which will serve you some lip smacking waffles with some delicious toppings n ice cream

The staff is quite good & friendly !

Must try : choco chip waffles !
name: Drool Waffles

review:
I have been to cafe delhi heights once n im just in love with this place !

The preparations are quite good & yummy. The staff is quite nice and polite. The ambiance is just great !

Must try : pasta, pizza & summer coolers
name: Cafe Delhi Heights

review:
A beautiful restaurant for dining with family & friends. It has a wide range of food ( multi cuisine )

The ambiance of place is great n the service is great

Must try : chocolate kulfi, mushrooms caps in green sauce , chilli chicken, ice tea , chocolate mousse
name: Wok In The Clouds

review:
Another cafe located in the heart of south campus ( Satya Niketan ) is one of the most famous cafe.

The tandoori momos which is loved by many people i feel is a bit hyped but other dishes like chilli potato, pizza & shakes are just delicious.

Must Try : chocolate shake , pizza, chilli potato...
name: QD's Restaurant

review:
Looking for some good mughlai food this is just the perfect place !
It serves just lip smacking kebabs which melt in mouth, varki roti, biryani , rolls etc

Must try : kakori kebab which just melts in mouth, the biryani which is spicy & authentic , varki roti
name: Alkauser

review:
If you wanna eat healthy & delicious subway is just perfect !
There freshly baked breads available in different flavours .
One can get there own subs with your own choice of bread , own veggies ,meat & choice of ur sauce

The staff at Kalkaji is quite amazing & thebplace has good ambiance too

Must try : chicken teriyaki, tandoori chicken
name: Subway

review:
Craving for some amazing preparations nandos is a mist try !

The place is huge & amazing with a good staff.

Haven't been many times but can suggest to try the chicken in pita bread & the skewers
name: Nando's

review:
A bakery which you can't miss !

Freshly homemade prepared cupcakes, cheesecakes , n some desserts which are irresistible !

Must try : rich chocolate cupcakes, raspberry cheesecake & hazelnut pie ( exactly don't remember the name )
name: The Bombaykery

review:
My family has Been visiting this shop since almost 30 or 35 years n this shop never fails to satisfy us with its lip smacking pastries , patties, rolls , & designer cakes !

Must try : creamy hot dog, any pastry or pudding worth it & if u planning for birthday cake next do try this !
name: Maxims Pastry Shop

review:
A small chocolate boutique in mkt 4 cr park. I have been visiting this place since childhood earlier it served the mirchi chocolates which was v famous now unfortunately they have stopped !

It has a wide range of chocolates, brownies, cake in jar & cupcakes at very affordable price.

Must try : choice walnut brownies, red velvet cupcake, all nutty chocolate,  truffle chocolate
name: Chocolatiers - The Chocolate Boutique

review:
kuch meetha hojaye ? bikanervala is the best place for ur sweet tooth. 

Apart from a wide range of sweets, bikanervala has just lip smacking food too like thali, chose bhautre, golgappe, raj kochi, chaat, pastry, Chinese samosa,

The place is just beautiful restaurants spread over 3 floors. 

Must try : boondi ke ladoo, indrani cup, vanilla cup, Chinese samosa, thali, pista burfi, kaju katli, rasamali, jalebi, long dal ka halwa , kulfi
name: Bikanervala

review:
MAD OVER DONUTS! you will definitely get amazed to see the lip smacking range of donuts, out there. 

Apart from donuts one must try MOD's cupcakes. Its one of the best cupcakes that too eggless, just great taste, soft & moist !

Must Try : chocolate donut, oreo cupcake , chocolate cupcake, mini donuts
name: Mad Over Donuts

review:
One of the good eating joints cr park !

It serves amazing Chinese, indian & mughali food. 

Must try panner tikka, malai tikka roll , chilli potato,
name: Juneja's Fast Food

review:
Kolkata biryani house located in market no 1 cr park. Special about the biryani is that it served with a boiled egg !

The taste is good one time try !
name: Kolkata Biryani House

review:
Looking for some bengali sandesh, rashugullaa, gulab jamun etc. then kamala sweets it is !

Very famous sweet shop located in mini kolkata ( CR PARK) which serves around 7 to 8 types of sandesh n smtyms even more than that !

Its just superb place to have some bengali metthai !

Must try : steamed sandesh, mango sandesh, beat root chop , rasugulla
name: Kamala Sweets

review:
Well if you love kathi roll then this is the best place to be!

Kolkata kathi roll is located in market no 1 cr park . Th hot & spicy kathi rolls are just lip smacking.

Apart from rolls fish cutlet, shawarma, chicken cutlet & aloo chop is definitely must try
name: Kolkata Hot Kathi Roll

review:
Craving for Chinese chaat so rolls & roast in Mk2 1 Cr park is the place! 

spicy & tangy Chinese platter is a must try. Apart from that the fish fry, chicken chop, egg roll, chicken tikka are some other dishes too which you can't miss !

So when you walk down market no1 to don't forget to hog on some yummy & spicy dishes from roll & roast
name: Roll n Roast

review:
Craving for desi food sant sweets is the best place to be !

From a wide range of meethies to lip smacking samosa, kachori , ram ladoo, chat paper, gol gape teamed up with a hot cup of tea, This is the place. 

This sweet shop delivers from a small order to huge orders at our doorstep without any delivery charges. One of the oldest sweet shop in double story kalkaji.

Must try : ragualiya, ram ladoo, chaat, chocolate burfi, gulab jammun
name: Sant Sweets

review:
Sweet & Crusty located inside eros hotel is one of the pastry shops i have been visiting since the age of 6 or 7. This bakery never fails to serve me & family in superb way. 

From the staff being super friendly to the quick service provided, its just amazing place to hang out.

Must try : red velvet cake, chocolate chip muffins, pineapple pastry, fresh fruit cake,chocolate pastry
name: Sweet & Crusty - Eros Hotel

review:
McD is one of the oldest burger chains in Delhi. It serves a wide range burgers, drinks, ice creams. Apart from all day serving burgers, they also serve a special breakfast menu from 8-11 am 

Even though the menu is similar to other outlets but still the McD kalkaji has a good ambiance spread in 2 floors.

Must Try : hot cake (breakfast menu ), chicken mc grill, mc pizza puff, fish-o- filet
name: McDonald's

review:
KANDY'S is one of the most loved bakery among kalkaji. It's one of the most oldest parlours in kalkaji. It has a wide range of pastries including all flavours. 

Apart from pastries they also have a wide variety of patties, rolls, pizza, burgers, sandwich, & homemade breads. 

The ambiance of the shop is quite good, you can have a good chill time with friends. 

Must Try : chocolate truffle pastry, black forest pastry, chicken patty, pineapple pastry.
name: Kandy's Pastry Parlour

review:
Giani's is one of the oldest sweet parlours in Delhi. Its outlet in Chandani Chowk which serves best rabri kulfi is something which no dilliwalla can miss. 

Giani's served amazing homemade ice cream with many flavours & kulfi which comes in many flavours (including chocolate :P)

must try : rabri kulfi, Belgium chocolate waffle cup, nutty butty, hot chocolate fudge
name: Giani's

review:
KFC one of the places which serves amazing crispy chicken, apart from the world famous fried chicken the range of crushers is also just amazingThe kfc kalkaji spread in 2 floors. Even though the menu is similar to other outlets but its amazing that its in kallaji. 

the ambience of this place is great. 

must try ;chicken zinger burger, vanilla blue mojito, chocobolt , peanut  bolt crushers, chicken bucket
name: KFC

review:
After a stressful lecture at college Cold Coffee at ccd is what you need !

This beautiful open place is favourite spot for jmc girls. Even though there are many ccd but i personally like this one because of its ambiance & location. 

Apart from coffee a lot other dishes are served too like...
name: Cafe Coffee Day

review:
Cinnabon is place which serves a wide range cinnamon rolls. They have different flavours to name few caramel, chocolate, salty etc. 

The rolls being there signature is available in many sizes. The rolls can be had with tea or coffee, it just tastes perfect. Apart from cinnamon rolls they also serve cupcakes, pretzel, coffee & coolers, 

Must try the chocolate flavour
name: Cinnabon

review:
Looking for a perfect date with your lover ? " ROSE CAFE" is the place to be !

Its little cafe on the road leasing to 5 senses garden, u might find some difficulty in searching this place its better to use google maps.

Its a beautiful cafe with a very limited seating. The interiors just perfect for a romantic lunch. It serves some yummy Italian food ,snacks & the awesome desserts are the cherry on the cake.

Must try the pasta, waffles, cottage steaks, mojitos & pizza. Beautiful place to be !
name: Rose Cafe

review:
"STARBUCKS INDIA " one of the most awaited food chains not only in delhi but all over india ! The place is just amazing for all the coffee lovers. Even though you might have to spend some extra bucks but you will definitely not regret it !

Starbucks has a whole lot of summer coolers, cold coffee, hot coffees ,some amazing snacks & some desserts to hog on !

Must try hot chocolate, java chip, hibiscus iced tea, mushroom pockets, vanilla latte , red velvet slice
name: Starbucks Coffee

review: This small little cafe inside one of the most famous bookshops in cp is something which you definitely can't miss! Not being a book lover but i have definitely visited the book store not for the books :p but for this amazing cafe & food "CHA BAR" The whole place the cafe & the bookstore is just so beautiful that you won't be able to resist yourself from clicking 100s of pictures. Definitely a beautiful place. The cha bar cafe has a quite lot of variety & the rates are affordable. Even though its a small place and smtyms you might have to wait in queue but its definitely worth it ! Must try there cold coffee, coolers , chicken sampler, pasta, pizza, sandwiches, cupcakes Not to miss...read more
name: Cha Bar

review:
An amazing authentic Chinese food cafe located inside dlf emporio mall.

The preparations are quite fresh & yummy. Though there menu is limited but its absolute delicious.

They have a range of amazing sushi, dimsums, which is a must try

Good place for a lunch with your partner.
name: Cha-Shi

review:
Well the thought of big chill gives me a cravings.
" THE BIG CHILL CAFE" is one of the best places i have been. The food & the taste is quite amazing. Its a good place to visit with friends & family.

Must try there pasta, pizza, grilled fish, milkshakes, bluberry cheesecake, hazelnut chessecake, Mississippi mud pie
name: The Big Chill

review:
Well i don't have many pictures of this beautiful place, but this place is very beautiful the interiors are as perfect as the food is.

They serve amazing kebabs i had there kakori kebab & the dudiya kebab, which was just amazingly prepared which melted in mouth just perfectly. You can even try there biryanis & other special main courses

A bit expensive place but worth it !
name: Dum-Pukht - ITC Maurya

review:
Oh my this place is just beautiful af. It small n quiet place perfect for a date🙈😋
It serves a lot of dishes . I tried there white sauce pasta which was yummy n there very famous red velvet cake slice which was the best red velvet I ever had.

This small cafe can not be missed when you are in hkv
name: Elma's Bakery & Kitchen

review:
Well this was the much awaited bakery in Delhi by most dilliwalas its small & cute bakery which serves a large amount of amazing cupcakes, cakes, pastry , puddings, cheesecakes etc.
It a bit expensive but worth a try.
name: The Big Chill Cakery

review:
Amazing chocolate truffle cake anyone ?

These lovely layers of rich chocolate is something which we definitely cant miss! Its delicious af 😍😍
name: Costa Coffee

review:
Did anyone say yogurts ?
So Cocoberry is the place to be guys. It serves amazing flavours with great toppings.

Something you can't resist after dinner. It has a lot outlets in Delhi do try
name: Cocoberry

review:
Amazing food a must try when in gtb nagar. Great meal. The pizza was amazing n the summer drinks too good.
Rates are pocket friendly
So next when you are planning to hang around with friends do try this
name: Spezia Bistro

review: this place has been my favourite since the time i was small . This place has always been the best as far as there taste, quantity & quality is concerned. One of the finest restaurants in Delhi. Love it ❤️
name: T.K'S Oriental Grill - Hyatt Regency

review: Good food, good ambience . I loved there veg kebabs & biryani. Since i visited on a Tuesday wasn't able to try the non veg dishes next time for sure !
name: Delhi Club House
